net.floodlightcontroller.util

类 InstructionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.util.InstructionUtils

  • public class InstructionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Convert OFInstructions to and from dpctl/ofctl-style strings. Used primarily by the static flow pusher to store and retreive flow entries.
    作者:
    Ryan Izard

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • appendInstruction

        public static void appendInstruction(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFlowMod.Builder fmb,
                     org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.instruction.OFInstruction inst)
        Adds the instructions to the list of OFInstructions in the OFFlowMod. Any pre-existing instruction of the same type is replaced with OFInstruction inst.
        参数:
        fmb, - the flow mod to append the instruction to
        inst, - the instuction to append

      • gotoTableToString

        public static java.lang.String gotoTableToString(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.instruction.OFInstructionGotoTable inst,
                                 org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Convert an OFInstructionGotoTable to string form. The string will be formatted in a dpctl/ofctl-style syntax.
        参数:
        inst; - The instruction to convert to a string
        log -
        返回:

      • gotoTableFromString

        public static void gotoTableFromString(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFlowMod.Builder fmb,
                       java.lang.String inst,
                       org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Convert the string representation of an OFInstructionGotoTable to an OFInstructionGotoTable. The instruction will be set within the OFFlowMod.Builder provided. Notice nothing is returned, but the side effect is the addition of an instruction in the OFFlowMod.Builder.
        参数:
        fmb; - The FMB in which to append the new instruction
        instStr; - The string to parse the instruction from
        log -

      • writeMetadataToString

        public static java.lang.String writeMetadataToString(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.instruction.OFInstructionWriteMetadata inst,
                                     org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Convert an OFInstructionMetadata to string form. The string will be formatted in a dpctl/ofctl-style syntax.
        参数:
        inst; - The instruction to convert to a string
        log -
        返回:

      • writeMetadataFromString

        public static void writeMetadataFromString(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFlowMod.Builder fmb,
                           java.lang.String inst,
                           org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Convert the string representation of an OFInstructionMetadata to an OFInstructionMetadata. The instruction will be set within the OFFlowMod.Builder provided. Notice nothing is returned, but the side effect is the addition of an instruction in the OFFlowMod.Builder.
        参数:

        log -
